TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AutomationFocusChangedEventArgs extends System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEventArgs

summary.span: Proporciona datos para un evento de cambio de foco.

span.span: Provides data for a focus-changed event.

related.span: Suscribirse a eventos de UI Automation
Eventos de UI Automation para clientes
Información general sobre eventos de UI Automation

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 idObject, int32 idChild) cil managed
Public Sub New (idObject As Integer, idChild As Integer)

param.name: idObject
param.span: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] del objeto que recibió el foco.

span.span: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] of the object that received focus.

param.name: idChild
param.span: Identificador secundario del objeto que recibió el foco.

span.span: The child ID of the object that received focus.

summary.span: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase .

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks El `idObject` y `idChild` parámetros contienen el [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)] objeto identificadores que pueden usar los clientes de UI Automation para vincular un a un `IAccessible` objeto en una aplicación de la tecnología de accesibilidad anterior.The `idObject` and `idChild` parameters contain the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)] object identifiers that UI Automation clients can use to link an to an `IAccessible` object in an older accessible technology application.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ChildId As Integer
public: property int ChildId { int get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: Obtiene el identificador de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)] secundario del objeto que recibe el foco.

span.span: Gets the child [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)] identifier of the object receiving focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Objeto [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] son valores de 32 bits que identifican las categorías de objetos accesibles dentro de una aplicación.Object [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] are 32-bit values that identify categories of accessible objects within an application. El `idObject` y `idChild` parámetros contienen el objeto [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] que los clientes pueden usar para vincular un a un `IAccessible` objeto en una aplicación de la tecnología de accesibilidad anterior.The `idObject` and `idChild` parameters contain the object [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] that clients can use to link an to an `IAccessible` object in an older accessible technology application.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ObjectId As Integer
public: property int ObjectId { int get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: Obtiene el [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] del objeto [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)] que generó el evento.

span.span: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)] object that generated the event.

value.span: El identificador de la [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elemento que recibe el foco.

span.span: The ID of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] element that is receiving focus.

value.span: Para los valores posibles, vea [identificadores de objeto](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/msaa/msaaccrf_5q05.asp) en la documentación de Microsoft Active Accessibility.

span.span: For possible values, see [Object Identifiers](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/msaa/msaaccrf_5q05.asp) in the Microsoft Active Accessibility documentation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Objeto [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] son valores de 32 bits que identifican las categorías de objetos accesibles dentro de una aplicación.Object [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] are 32-bit values that identify categories of accessible objects within an application. El `idObject` y `idChild` parámetros contienen el objeto [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] que los clientes pueden usar para vincular un a un `IAccessible` objeto en una aplicación de la tecnología de accesibilidad anterior.The `idObject` and `idChild` parameters contain the object [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] that clients can use to link an to an `IAccessible` object in an older accessible technology application.
